thread.title: Californian dad dies after tooth infection spread to lungs | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Californian dad dies after tooth infection spread to lungs | Daily Mail Online

author: Snejana Farberov For Dailymail.Com
title: Californian dad dies after tooth infection spread to lungs | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Married father-of-two, 26, dies after a tooth infection spread to his lungs on a cross-country work trip Vadim Kondratyuk, of California, died in a Utah hospital on Monday after an infection spread from his tooth to his lungs The 26-year-old long-haul truck driver had first complained of toothache two weeks ago before setting out on a cross-country trip to New York He visited a dentist in Oklahoma who cleaned out his tooth and gave him antibiotics Pain returned as Kondratyuk set out on return trip to California, leaving him too weak to drive His brother raced to his side to help bring him home, but Kondrayuk's condition worsened to the point he required hospitalization in Utah Doctors worked for four days to try and stop the spread of infection, but eventually his lungs filled with fluid and his heart failed Kondratyuk is survived by his wife of four years and their two girls, ages two years and 11 months Published: 20:48 GMT, 31 January 2017 | Updated: 00:48 GMT, 1 February 2017 67 shares
